post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Project Manager, Mobile Applications
About the Job
VTRAC Consulting Corporation
"Solutions for Growth"

Please e-mail your resume as a MS-WORD document in confidence subject Project Manager (Mobile/Wireless Applications), JOB Number: 2543, Attention: peterc@vtrac.com or call: (416) 366-2600 x 222.

Position:  Project Manager (Mobile/Wireless Applications)
Location: Entertainment District
Position Type: Permanent
Job ID: 2601

We are looking for a talented and passionate individual to help us deliver the next generation of mobile applications in a thriving start-up environment. You should be out-spoken, eager and ready to help us manage exciting new mobile applications that will have a positive impact on the world.

Position Summary:

 Creating leading-edge applications on virtually every smartphone platform including iPhone, BlackBerry, Android, Palm Pre, Windows Mobile and Mobile Web.
 To ensure that software solutions are delivered to customers on time, on budget and to the expected quality.

Responsible For:

Project/Practice Management
 Create and execute project work plans and revise them as appropriate to meet changing needs and requirements
 Identify resources needed and assign individual responsibilities
 Manage day to day operational aspects of the project
 Review deliverables prepared by team before passing to client
 Prepare for engagement reviews and quality assurance procedure
 Proactively minimize and mitigate risks on projects
 Ensure project documents are complete and stored appropriately
 Review deliverables prepared by team before releasing them to client
 Ensure that management and client sign off defined approvals at appropriate stages throughout the project
 Control Change Request authorizations

Project Profitability

 Track and monitor hours claimed for the project against pricing and development budgets
 Identify and explain variances to budgets
 Recommend action plans to keep project on budget

Communication

 Facilitate team and client meetings effectively
 Hold regular status meetings with project team
 Keep management and client informed of project status
 Resolve and or escalate issues in a timely fashion
 Inform Director of Sales of milestones to be billed to the customer

Human Resources
 Develop staff on an informal basis through coaching and mentoring
 Provide feedback regarding team's performance to Development Managers

Required Skills and Experience:

Must have mobile applications experience for smartphones
 A proven track record of successful project implementation in a software environment.
 Team management experience and comfortable managing project teams of 5-10 people.
 Excellent client-facing skills.
 Experience with the entire project life cycle and able to operate in the initial conceptual design stage, in the depths of system testing, and at each stage in between
 The ability to foster motivation within the project team to meet tight deadlines.
 The ability to have a strong impact and influence key decisions.
 Experience with agile methodologies and practices
 Experience with tools such as JIRA, MS Project and Confluence

Benefits:

 Competitive salary
 Full benefits
 Casual work environment
 Location: Downtown Toronto (entertainment district)
 Games Room: XBox on a big screen!

We thank all the candidates in advance. Only those candidates that are selected for interview will be contacted. For other exciting opportunities, please visit us at www.vtrac.com .
post.title: Mobile Applications Developer (Consulting)
